mapper.update: update product set prod_readcount = (prod_readcount + 1) where prod_id = #{prod_id}
mapper.select: select * from (select rownum as rn, e.* from (select * from product order by prod_readcount desc) e) where rn between #{offset} and (#{offset} + #{cardsPerPage} - 1)
select * from product order by prod_date desc

select.if: select * from product where prod_name like '%${ value }%' or sel_id like '%${ value }%'
